subject: statistics
title: Regression Assumptions: Linearity, Independence, Normality, Homoscedasticity
contentHtml:
The regression assumptions are crucial in ensuring that our linear regression model is accurate and reliable.

  • Linearity: The relationship between the independent variable(s) and dependent variable should be linear.
  • Independence: Each observation should be independent of the others.
  • Normality: The residuals should follow a normal distribution.
  • Homoscedasticity: The variance of the residuals should be constant across all levels of the independent variable(s).
intuition: These assumptions allow us to make inferences about the population based on a random sample.
realWorldApplications: In machine learning, these assumptions are crucial for developing accurate and reliable models.
